alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Grundy; Harrison; Mercer (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 1:28PM CDT until March 31 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Daviess County in north central Missouri... Northwestern Grundy County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Mercer County in north central Missouri... Southeastern Harrison County in north central Missouri... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 127 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pattonsburg, or 7 miles northwest of Gallatin, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gilman City, Pattonsburg, Winston, Altamont, Coffey, Jameson, Brimson and Modena. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 64 and 87. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Missouri.
